responseTime: We typically respond to emails within 24 hours during business days.
urgentNote: For urgent matters, please contact us directly via email.

faqs.question: How do I report a bug?
faqs.answer: You can report bugs by creating an issue on our GitHub repository or by contacting us directly via email.

faqs.question: Is arAIse open source?
faqs.answer: Yes, arAIse is fully open source under the MIT license. You can find the source code on our GitHub repository.

faqs.question: How can I contribute to the project?
faqs.answer: Check out our Contribute page for detailed information on how to contribute to arAIse.

faqs.question: Are there any system requirements?
faqs.answer: For the web version, any modern browser will work. For the CLI version, you need Python 3.8+ installed.
